verses.name: Mark 12:25
verses.text: For when they shall rise from the dead, they neither marry, nor are given in marriage; but are as the angels which are in heaven.

verses.name: Mark 12:26
verses.text: And as touching the dead, that they rise: have ye not read in the book of Moses, how in the bush God spake unto him, saying, I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob?

verses.name: Mark 12:27
verses.text: He is not the God of the dead, but the God of the living: ye therefore do greatly err.
